body_html: Is cuDNN v5.1 compatible with theano 0.8.2? (minus LSTM, RNN optimizations) I had cuDNN 5005 and cuda 7.5 working with an older kepler card. I THINK i need cuda 8.0 to work with my gxt 1060. Should I update to win10? I am on 8.1 atm. Things are not quite right yet (ie.. processes seems to stall or are just slower than I am patient.
